title: Zeifus
description: Zeifus is a unified business management platform that simplifies project management, HR processes, and client handling. Designed for small teams, freelancers, and service-based companies, it combines tools for task management, recruitment, invoicing, payroll, and team collaboration. With seamless integrations, 15GB of free object storage, and support for 100 users on the free plan, Zeifus empowers businesses to streamline operations and improve efficiency—all in one place.
